fields.title: University of Texas El Paso
fields.description:
<ul>

<li>Designed and developed a computer laboratory management system in which computer lab managers could manage everything related to their specific lab such as run usage reports, set availability hours, add staff , etc.</li>

<li>Created web services and batch file scripts to aid in collecting computer usage statistics</li>

<li>Developed a report generator application for our print system administrator</li>

</ul>

fields.title: Salesforce
fields.description:
Worked on Customer Relationship Management software under the user interface and locale team; exposed to the Software as a service paradigm and cloud computing and applied it to the daily duties required by my job.

<ul>

<li>Implemented interactive user-interface features and bug fixes.</li>

<li>Algorithm design and analysis to help improve performance.</li>

<li>Implemented, analyzed and improved algorithms in the realm of language and semantic processing for languages such as Turkish and Hungarian, new languages which were not yet supported by the CRM app.</li>

<li>Participated in agile software development process using scrum.</li>

</ul>

fields.title: Phillips Healthcare
fields.description:
<ul>

<li>Designed, developed and tested an hour tracking tool using Linux, Struts 2, Tomcat 6, and JUnit</li>

<li>Designed and developed the database schema to be the heart of the hour tracking system using PostgreSQL</li>

<li>Regularly participated in code reviews both for my code changes and my team members’</li>

<li>Bug fixes and new feature implementation on XIRIS (eXtended Internet Radiology Information System) using Linux, Struts 1, and Tomcat 5/6 with PostgreSQL and Oracle</li>

</ul>

fields.title: Acumen Solutions
fields.description:
<ul>

<li>Provide consulting services during the entire software development cycle, particularly in software design and development</li>

<li>Developed applications for various clients using different platforms such as .NET, Java, Force.com, and objective-c</li>

<li>Developed web services to integrate with legacy and/or external systems</li>

<li>Promoted December 2010</li>

</ul>

fields.title: University of Texas El Paso
fields.description: Graduated with a BS in Computer Science
